cards.Name: In the Dark of the Night
Nightblood Sanctum
cards.Notes: I don't like this thing's subtypes. Fortification maybe? Lair? Cabal?

cards.Name: False Identity
cards.Notes: Maybe it should only have 2 health?

cards.Name: Nightshroud Aura
cards.Notes: Might be oppressive in the same way as Basilic Devastator.

cards.Name: Evincar of Offerings
cards.Category of Card: Card Filtering, Discard Outlet, Graveyard Hate.

cards.Name: Entrance
cards.Archetype?: Discard Outlet. Discard matters. Go-Wide Hate.

cards.Name: Awakening Thrall
cards.Notes: Might make this a Sorcerer. Can be dragon's breathed to death so easily! -Old note.

cards.Name: Magus Immemorial
cards.Archetype?: Undead Matters. Individual Hate. Scavenge combatant.

cards.Name: Master of Torment
cards.Notes: Used to be called Torment which was a much better name in my opinion.

cards.Name: Wall of Bones
cards.Notes: Joaquin says this is too good.

cards.Name: Harbinger of Sorrows
cards.Notes: Change this card to trigger only off of your first Magecraft, but double the trigger. That way I can dodge the trap that is overly typal decks.

cards.Name: Siege Rations
cards.Notes: If you are allowed to declare no targets, then theoretically the "may" is superfluous.

cards.Name: Oria Warweaver
cards.Notes: Might need to reduce this defense so it is easier to interact with.

cards.Name: Eversiege Veteran
cards.Notes: This card used to have an activated ability circle in order to do its thing, but people complained that that was too good at stalling and whatnot and so now it is this. I kind of want to put the circle back, but I don't want the card to be too good/annoying to play against. Also Soldier and maybe also Engineer are relevant cardtypes.

cards.Name: Snare
cards.Notes: Might be too cruel. Also might change the draw on this to be 1 card or only 2 cards? The draw on this is poorly worded and a bit weird.

cards.Name: Avengard Ramparts
cards.Notes: Probably a bit too overpowered. Maybe make the anthem effect require a discard or two to trigger? Maybe make this card only buff squadrons. Make the anthem, the bulwark, and the safeguard come online during the endstep of the turn it is played. That way, initially, it doesn't do anything. So basically you are still building it.

cards.Name: Earthquake
cards.Subtypes: Card that negates and deals 1 damage to all combatants. Penetrate 2.

cards.Name: Frenzied Flamedancers
cards.Archetype?: Draw Matters. Magecraft and Miracle matter

cards.Name: Crystal Ball
cards.Notes: Maybe make it trigger at upkeep so it's immune to negates?

cards.Name: Arcane Conduit
cards.Notes: Maybe make it trigger at upkeep so to be immune to negation. Also makes it a non-bo with Awakening Thrall.

cards.Name: Spellcraft Orb
cards.Notes: Wait, this is a faction break. I didn't want Pyromancers to be generating leadership. I mean, this isn't a particularly good card anyways.

cards.Name: Firebreathing Formation
cards.Archetype?: Cards in Hand Matter. Noncombat damage matters

cards.Name: Cleansing Ritual
cards.Notes: Might nerf this by making the ability to sacrifice it trigger at your endstep so that your opponent still gets the advantage of that asset for that turn. Cost of one-shotting Avengard Ramparts. Or, you can't use it on the turn you've deployed it.

cards.Name: Volkovian Stronghold
cards.Notes: Oh, wait. Nerfed Volkovian Stronghold would need an additional combatant in order to get Centauri Starspawn to go off.
